name: Cave Escape: Wrath of Shoth
description:
Cave Escape: Lair of Shoth is a third person horror survival game, you have fallen into a pit while exploring a nearby temple that was declared off limits by the village elders. You have to traverse the cave and seek the way out, all while having to keep your strength up by digging for mushrooms and fruit.

Credits -

Chris Kopp- Programmer, Level Design, UI Design

Omar Giron- Modeler and Character Design

Patrick Scoggin- Modeler and Character Design

Arron Gampon- Animator

Isaak Munoz- Sound Design

Pablo Molina- Character Design and Video Editing.
